statements: DELETE FROM Statistical_Analysis WHERE Experiment_Date < '2021-01-01' AND Sample_Size > 100;
DELETE FROM Economic_Benefits WHERE crop_name = 'Corn' AND gmo_used = TRUE;
DELETE FROM crop_production_data WHERE production_year = 2020 AND crop_name = 'Corn';
DELETE FROM farm_data WHERE total_acres > 500 AND gmo_usage = True;
DELETE FROM survey_responses WHERE survey_id = 'XYZ123' AND response_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM economic_benefits WHERE id = 10 AND crop_name = 'Rice';
